17:43 <vmassol> Enygma`: hi, could this be caused by the changes you did for the script permission: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-rendering-macro-groovy/1512/testReport/ ?  
17:45 <vmassol> Enygma`: could this be related too http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-index-test-tests/1512/testReport/org.xwiki.index.test.ui/SpacesTest/spacesMacro/ ?  
17:49 <Bugen\_do> has joined #xwiki  
17:49 <lucaa> has quit  
17:57 <Enygma`> vmassol: I was just fixing http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform%24xwiki-platform-rendering-macro-groovy/1512/testReport/  
17:57 <Enygma`> yes, they are related  
17:57 <Enygma`> the other ones, I need to double check  
18:01 <Enygma`> that should take care of the groovy macro tests  
18:09 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
18:10 <Old\_Xwikier> has joined #xwiki  
18:14 <Old\_Xwikier> Going to try upgrading my old Xwiki 1.4.9828 instance..  I guess to 7.1?   I've exported to XAR, but would it be better to just do a database dump and attempt it that way?  
18:15 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
18:16 <Old\_Xwikier> It's just a tech notes type of xwiki instance..  maybe it would be better to setup a new 7.1 and import the default XAR then import only the knowledgebase wiki instead of trying to get all the old admin stuff updated..  
18:20 <cjd> What I'd do:  
18:20 <cjd> setup the new wiki  
18:20 <cjd> export just the pages you want and load them  
18:21 <cjd> hope for the best (XWiki 1.x used a renderer which is now gone if I recall correctly)  
18:21 <Enygma`> not gone, but almost legacy  
18:22 <Enygma`> (extracted to its own module to be removed in the future)  
18:24 <Old\_Xwikier> Thanks!  I'll give that a try..  it's not a real complex wiki just mostly Q&A pages with some tables in a couple of them.  
18:28 <vmassol> Enygma`: ok thanks!
